verses.verse: And as He passed <S%G3855><s%> by, He saw <S%G3708><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> blind <S%G5185><s%> from birth. <S%G1079><s%>

And His disciples <S%G3101><s%> asked <S%G2065><s%> Him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Rabbi, <S%G4461><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> sinned, <S%G264><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G3778><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> his parents, <S%G1118><s%> that he should be born <S%G1080><s%> blind <S%G5185><s%>?"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> "[It was] neither <S%G3777><s%> [that] this <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G3778><s%> sinned, <S%G264><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> his parents; <S%G1118><s%> but [it was] in order <S%G2443><s%> that the works <S%G2041><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> might be displayed <S%G5319><s%> in him.

"We must <S%G1163><s%> work <S%G2038><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of Him who sent <S%G3992><s%> Me, as long <S%G2193><s%> as it is day; <S%G2250><s%> night <S%G3571><s%> is coming, <S%G2064><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> work. <S%G2038><s%>
"While <S%G3752><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> in the world, <S%G2889><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> the light <S%G5457><s%> of the world. <S%G2889><s%>"

When He had said <S%G3004><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> He spat <S%G4429><s%> on the ground, <S%G5476><s%> and made <S%G4160><s%> clay <S%G4081><s%> of the spittle, <S%G4427><s%> and applied <S%G2007><s%> the clay <S%G4081><s%> to his eyes, <S%G3788><s%>

and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Go, <S%G5217><s%> wash <S%G3538><s%> in the pool <S%G2861><s%> of Siloam <S%G4611><s%>" (which <S%G3739><s%> is translated, <S%G2059><s%> Sent <S%G649><s%>). And so <S%G3767><s%> he went <S%G565><s%> away <S%G565><s%> and washed, <S%G3538><s%> and came <S%G2064><s%> [back] seeing. <S%G991><s%>

The neighbors <S%G1069><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> and those <S%G3588><s%> who previously <S%G4387><s%> saw <S%G2334><s%> him as a beggar, <S%G4319><s%> were saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Is not this <S%G3778><s%> the one who used to sit <S%G2521><s%> and beg <S%G4319><s%>?"

Others <S%G243><s%> were saying, <S%G3004><s%> "This <S%G3778><s%> is he," [still] others <S%G243><s%> were saying, <S%G3004><s%> "No, <S%G3780><s%> but he is like <S%G3664><s%> him." He kept saying, <S%G3004><s%> "I am <S%G1510><s%> the one."
Therefore <S%G3767><s%> they were saying <S%G3004><s%> to him, "How <S%G4459><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> were your eyes <S%G3788><s%> opened <S%G455><s%>?"

He answered, <S%G611><s%> "The man <S%G444><s%> who is called <S%G3004><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> made <S%G4160><s%> clay, <S%G4081><s%> and anointed <S%G2025><s%> my eyes, <S%G3788><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to me, 'Go <S%G5217><s%> to Siloam, <S%G4611><s%> and wash <S%G3538><s%>' ; so <S%G3767><s%> I went <S%G565><s%> away <S%G565><s%> and washed, <S%G3538><s%> and I received <S%G308><s%> sight. <S%G308><s%>"
And they said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Where <S%G4226><s%> is He?" He said, <S%G3004><s%> "I do not know. <S%G3609><s%>"
They brought <S%G71><s%> to the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> him who was formerly <S%G4218><s%> blind. <S%G5185><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> it was a Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> on the day <S%G2250><s%> when <S%G3739><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> made <S%G4160><s%> the clay, <S%G4081><s%> and opened <S%G455><s%> his eyes. <S%G3788><s%>

Again, <S%G3825><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> were asking <S%G2065><s%> him how <S%G4459><s%> he received <S%G308><s%> his sight. <S%G308><s%> And he said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "He applied <S%G2007><s%> clay <S%G4081><s%> to my eyes, <S%G3788><s%> and I washed, <S%G3538><s%> and I see. <S%G991><s%>"

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> were saying, <S%G3004><s%> "This <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G444><s%> is not from God, <S%G2316><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> He does not keep <S%G5083><s%> the Sabbath. <S%G4521><s%>" But others <S%G243><s%> were saying, <S%G3004><s%> "How <S%G4459><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> who is a sinner <S%G268><s%> perform <S%G2038><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%>?" And there was a division <S%G4978><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> them.

They said <S%G3004><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> to the blind <S%G5185><s%> man <S%G5185><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%> "What <S%G5101><s%> do you say <S%G3004><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> Him, since <S%G3754><s%> He opened <S%G455><s%> your eyes <S%G3788><s%>?" And he said, <S%G3004><s%> "He is a prophet. <S%G4396><s%>"

The Jews <S%G2453><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> did not believe <S%G4100><s%> [it] of him, that he had been <S%G1510><s%> blind, <S%G5185><s%> and had received <S%G308><s%> sight, <S%G308><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> they called <S%G5455><s%> the parents <S%G1118><s%> of the very <S%G846><s%> one <S%G846><s%> who had received <S%G308><s%> his sight, <S%G308><s%>

and questioned <S%G2065><s%> them, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Is this <S%G3778><s%> your son, <S%G5207><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> you say <S%G3004><s%> was born <S%G1080><s%> blind <S%G5185><s%>? Then <S%G3767><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> does he now <S%G737><s%> see <S%G991><s%>?"

His parents <S%G1118><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> them and said, <S%G3004><s%> "We know <S%G3609><s%> that this <S%G3778><s%> is our son, <S%G5207><s%> and that he was born <S%G1080><s%> blind; <S%G5185><s%>

but how <S%G4459><s%> he now <S%G3568><s%> sees, <S%G991><s%> we do not know; <S%G3609><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> opened <S%G455><s%> his eyes, <S%G3788><s%> we do not know. <S%G3609><s%> Ask <S%G2065><s%> him; he is of age, <S%G2244><s%> he shall speak <S%G2980><s%> for himself. <S%G1438><s%> "

His parents <S%G1118><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they were afraid <S%G5399><s%> of the Jews; <S%G2453><s%> for the Jews <S%G2453><s%> had already <S%G2235><s%> agreed, <S%G4934><s%> that if <S%G1437><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> should confess <S%G3670><s%> Him to be Christ, <S%G5547><s%> he should be put <S%G656><s%> out of the synagogue. <S%G656><s%>
For this <S%G3778><s%> reason <S%G1223><s%> his parents <S%G1118><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "He is of age; <S%G2244><s%> ask <S%G2065><s%> him."

So <S%G3767><s%> a second <S%G1208><s%> time <S%G1208><s%> they called <S%G5455><s%> the man <S%G444><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> had been <S%G1510><s%> blind, <S%G5185><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Give <S%G1325><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> to God; <S%G2316><s%> we know <S%G3609><s%> that this <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G444><s%> is a sinner. <S%G268><s%>"

He therefore <S%G3767><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> "Whether <S%G1487><s%> He is a sinner, <S%G268><s%> I do not know; <S%G3609><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> thing <S%G1520><s%> I do know, <S%G3609><s%> that, whereas I was blind, <S%G5185><s%> now <S%G737><s%> I see. <S%G991><s%>"
They said <S%G3004><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> to him, "What <S%G5101><s%> did He do <S%G4160><s%> to you? How <S%G4459><s%> did He open <S%G455><s%> your eyes <S%G3788><s%>?"

He answered <S%G611><s%> them, "I told <S%G3004><s%> you already, <S%G2235><s%> and you did not listen; <S%G191><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> do you want <S%G2309><s%> to hear <S%G191><s%> [it] again <S%G3825><s%>? You do not want <S%G2309><s%> to become <S%G1096><s%> His disciples <S%G3101><s%> too, <S%G2532><s%> do you?"
And they reviled <S%G3058><s%> him, and said, <S%G3004><s%> "You are His disciple, <S%G3101><s%> but we are disciples <S%G3101><s%> of Moses. <S%G3475><s%>

"We know <S%G3609><s%> that God <S%G2316><s%> has spoken <S%G2980><s%> to Moses; <S%G3475><s%> but as for this <S%G3778><s%> man, <S%G3778><s%> we do not know <S%G3609><s%> where <S%G4159><s%> He is from."

The man <S%G444><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Well, <S%G1063><s%> here <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3778><s%> is an amazing <S%G2298><s%> thing, <S%G2298><s%> that you do not know <S%G3609><s%> where <S%G4159><s%> He is from, and [yet] He opened <S%G455><s%> my eyes. <S%G3788><s%>

"We know <S%G3609><s%> that God <S%G2316><s%> does not hear <S%G191><s%> sinners; <S%G268><s%> but if <S%G1437><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> is God-fearing, and does <S%G4160><s%> His will, <S%G2307><s%> He hears <S%G191><s%> him.

"Since <S%G1537><s%> the beginning <S%G165><s%> of time <S%G165><s%> it has never <S%G3756><s%> been heard <S%G191><s%> that anyone <S%G5100><s%> opened <S%G455><s%> the eyes <S%G3788><s%> of a person <S%G5185><s%> born <S%G1080><s%> blind. <S%G5185><s%>
"If <S%G1487><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G3778><s%> were not from God, <S%G2316><s%> He could <S%G1410><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> nothing. <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3762><s%>"

They answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "You were born <S%G1080><s%> entirely <S%G3650><s%> in sins, <S%G266><s%> and are you teaching <S%G1321><s%> us?" And they put <S%G1544><s%> him out.

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> that they had put <S%G1544><s%> him out; and finding <S%G2147><s%> him, He said, <S%G3004><s%> "Do you believe <S%G4100><s%> in the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%>?"
He answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "And who <S%G5101><s%> is He, Lord, <S%G2962><s%> that I may believe <S%G4100><s%> in Him?"
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "You have both <S%G2532><s%> seen <S%G3708><s%> Him, and He is the one who is talking <S%G2980><s%> with you."
And he said, <S%G5346><s%> "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> I believe. <S%G4100><s%>" And he worshiped <S%G4352><s%> Him.

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "For judgment <S%G2917><s%> I came <S%G2064><s%> into this <S%G3778><s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> that those <S%G3588><s%> who do not see <S%G991><s%> may see; <S%G991><s%> and that those <S%G3588><s%> who see <S%G991><s%> may become <S%G1096><s%> blind. <S%G5185><s%>"

Those <S%G3588><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> who were with Him heard <S%G191><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things, <S%G3778><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "We are not blind <S%G5185><s%> too, <S%G2532><s%> are we?"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "If <S%G1487><s%> you were blind, <S%G5185><s%> you would have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> sin; <S%G266><s%> but since <S%G3568><s%> you say, <S%G3004><s%> 'We see, <S%G991><s%>' your sin <S%G266><s%> remains. <S%G3306><s%>
